---
title: "Get Involved"
toc: false
---

Become a member of the JEDI Outreach Group by filling out the form below.
Members receive emails from our chair on JEDI-related news, can contribute to the community by joining one of our committees, vote for future committee board members, and more.

If you are interested in learning more about the JEDI Outreach Group, contact us at [admin\@datascijedi.org](mailto:admin@datascijedi.org).
